product: Aqualisa Aquastream White Chrome effect Thermostatic Mixer Shower
description: Suitable for low pressure systems, this mixer power shower from Aqualisa comes with riser rail, hose and controller.Manufacturer guarantee: 3 yearsOnly fixings includedCompatible with Gravity fed systemsFeatures and benefitsAqualisa Aquastream mixer power shower is the quick and easy way to install a pumped shower if you have a gravity system.Aquastream shower has an integrated booster pumpThe mixer power shower comes with a unique bimetallic thermostatic technologyAqualisa offers a superb power shower performanceThere is a choice of 2 flow rates, one with 10 litres and a second with 18 litres per minuteAqualisa Aquastream has 4 spray patterns, one of which is a water saving eco-spray patternHighest point of shower head must be below the underside of the cistern for minimum pressure

product: Mira Miniduo EV Thermostatic Shower Valve - Chrome
description: Minimalist design and great performance, the Mira Miniduo EV delivers all the performance you would expect from a Mira mixer and works on all systems and pressures, even at low pressure. The separate flow and temperature controls help fine tune the perfect shower. Features & Benefits:   Easy to fit & maintain.  Four spray shower head.  110mm pipe centres.  Thermostatic temperature control.  Reversed inlets support.  Rub-clean nozzles for easy cleaning.  Thermostatic shutdown within 2 seconds.  Cold water range: Up to 25°C  Hot water range: 55°C-65°C  Inlet connections: 15mm compression  Outlet connections: ½” BSP Male Flat Face  Replaceable cartridge.  WRAS & TMV2 Approved.  The Mira Magni-flo™ technology delivers up to 3x more flow, even at low pressure.

product: Mira Advance Flex Thermostatic Electric Shower 8.7kw White/Chrome
description: The Advance Flex is a reliable and long lasting shower. The safety and usage features have the more vulnerable user in mind (audible beeps and high contrast visuals plus large easy press buttons) plus Mira's Clearscale technology helps reduce the build up of limescale.
